description:
This:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/hyperv/vmops.py#L104

results in this:

__init__2013-07-03 14:10:56.809 4560 TRACE nova.exception     message = self.message % kwargs
2013-07-03 14:10:56.809 4560 TRACE nova.exception KeyError: u'instance_id'

Using nova master for havana.
title: hyperv driver get_info raises InstanceNotFound with wrong msg format variable
